item.title: Nginx 状态监控
item.description: Nginx 开启status用以监控状态信息 Nginx 可以通过with-http_stub_status_module模块来监控nginx的一些状态信息。 通过nginx -V来查看是否有with-http_stub_status_module该模块。 # nginx -V nginx version: nginx/1.16.1 built by gcc 4.8.5 20150623 (Red Hat 4.8.5-39) (GCC) built with OpenSSL 1.0.2k-fips 26 Jan 2017 TLS SNI support
